calcPALC¶

author: Arne Hoelter

The calcPALC module contains the calcPALC method.

calcPALC.calcPALC(PALC_plots, PALC_pal, PALC_config, Opt_arr)[source]¶

Handles the different PALC approaches. Offers the functionality of the Hard Margin Gap Handling Approaches. Without and Soft Margin Gap Handling Approach call directily calc_angles.

Parameters

  • PALC_plots (obj [in, out]) – Contains plotting information.

  • PALC_pal (obj [in]) – Contains all venue information.

  • PALC_config (obj [in]) – Contains PALC configuration data.

  • Opt_arr (obj [in, out]) – Contains the data of the optimized LSA.

Returns

Return type

None.

Next topic

PALC_functions
